channel.title: Are Toilets Cleaner? Or Are Water Fountains?
channel.description:
And the answer is......TOILETS!!!!
Also Gotta Catch em all, i mean in general not specific ones as some people said, it was all over the news :D

item.title: Are Toilets Cleaner? Or Are Water Fountains?
item.dc:creator: @takeNout takeNout
item.description:
@takeNout wrote:

Toilets are far cleaner, they get washed regularly - assuming you DO actually wash your toilet, whereas fountains might get washed, once every few months - if that.
Why we think toilets are dirty is more of a psychological thing, I mean, who wants to think the place where we shit and piss is clean?

Read full topic
item.source: Are Toilets Cleaner? Or Are Water Fountains?

item.title: Are Toilets Cleaner? Or Are Water Fountains?
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“MidGuardian, post:25, topic:113473”]First of all… NEWSFLASH

I think toilets are cleaner, because if you didn’t know the water that we flush it is the same water we drink, but I already pushed water fountains before i thought of it

It’s been filtered through so many things to get the shit taste and piss taste out of it. So we’re not exactly drinking the exact kind of water which was flushed down our toilets.

There are these korean (no offence) who eat their morning tea and lunch in the toilets.
Consisting of drinks & food.
Translation - THEY LITERALLY EAT SHIT AND DRINK PISS
Mind my emphasis of capitals[/quote]

When Ghandi woke up every morning, he would drink his piss.

Read full topic
item.source: Are Toilets Cleaner? Or Are Water Fountains?

Read full topic

item.title: Are Toilets Cleaner? Or Are Water Fountains?
item.dc:creator: @MidGuardian MidGuardian
item.description:
@MidGuardian wrote:

First of all… NEWSFLASH

There are these korean (no offence) who eat their morning tea and lunch in the toilets.
Consisting of drinks & food.
Translation - THEY LITERALLY EAT SHIT AND DRINK PISS
Mind my emphasis of capitals

In other words, dogs drink out of toilets why cant we? not like a dog can drink out of a foutain
Plus you cant always rely on fountains to be clean, people shove their mouths in and lick it…
And sometimes at school ones, some people do crazy stuff to our fountains
e.g Shove fireworks in it, Using the downstairs utility to remove urine from the body to the fountain.
Water is recycled in your toilet, so you never know if the water from the fountain is recycled
e.g the drain at the bottom… it might flow back up to the fountain.
What about the Duck cleaning products that claim to remove 99.99% of germs?
If they make these cleaning products that claim to remove 99.99% of germs and you use that product, then drink out of toilet. Just after you let out some nuclear bombs… :eek:

Ok thats me … ta

Read full topic
item.source: Are Toilets Cleaner? Or Are Water Fountains?

item.title: Are Toilets Cleaner? Or Are Water Fountains?
item.dc:creator: @_1one_eleven1 !!1one!eleven1!
item.description:
@_1one_eleven1 wrote:

Its hard to say.

Toilets get flushed and some households have products in the water or hanging in the bowl.

The fountain would have chlorine and the water would be filtered.

I would say toilet as the bowl gets flushed, most nasties would go down the drain, however with a filtered fountain, you cant filter the little nasties so it would just loop, and i would rather drink/eat my own nasties then an animals nasties.

Read full topic
item.source: Are Toilets Cleaner? Or Are Water Fountains?
